column17:
Designed to make you look fashionable and beautiful this saree from the house of Designersareez is a wardrobe essential. Crafted from chiffon this black coloured saree makes use of self-horizontal stripes all over which gives it a chic look. Team it with a pair of pretty danglers to add up to its aesthetic appeal.

Features
  • Type: Saree with unstitched blouse piece
  • Colour: Black
  • Fabric: Chiffon
  • Occasion: Party Wear
  • Design: Self horizontal stripes
  • Blouse Colour: Black
  • Length: 6.3 meter along with unstitched blouse piece

Wash & Care
Wash it with a mild detergent.
If washing in a machine set it on a delicate mode and low temperature cycle.
Wash dark colours separately and use iron at low temperature.
